attributes.action: TAX relieve for Private school fees
attributes.additional_details:
We pay very high private school fees for a better education for our children.
What we must petition for is to get a tax relieve for the full monthly fees to private schools.
Our state education is so bad, now we are punished for that if we send our kids to private schools.
It is not just the rich that do that but a lot of middle class send there kids to private schools.
The situation now is that we have to ad TAX on top of our school fees and that is UNFAIR.
TAX RELIEVE FOR PRIVATE SCHOOL FEES.
